title: Picture of Nigeria’s Abubakar with Trump was photoshopped
subtitle: With four months to Nigeria’s general elections, political campaigning is reach
author: africacheck.org
vclaim:
With four months to Nigeria’s general elections, political campaigning is reaching a fever pitch – and so is misinformation.

One case involves a photo of Atiku Abubakar, the presidential candidate from the opposition

“Atiku Abubaka just arrived united States of America dis night,” wrote the user

. “Shame on all of u dat said Atiku can not visit USA.”

It’s rumoured that Abubakar, who was vice president from 1999 to 2007, can’t visit the US for fear of being charged with money laundering. But

told them “public court records… do not show cases filed against a defendant named Atiku Abubakar”.

Photo is of Trump and Buhari

Is the photo real? No.

shows the picture was altered. The original photo - shown here on the right - was taken in April 2018 when current President Muhammadu Buhari

at the US White House. -
